duration_in_months: What does this data format remind you of?
full_summary:
======================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

### Tender Information

* **Tender Number:** R0000155743
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Tender Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the PASS (SA) E60ZQ-180001/D. The requirement is open to all suppliers listed under the PASS Supply Arrangement Holders.

The tender is for the provision of Information Technology and Systems Audit Services. The successful supplier will be awarded a contract for two years, with three one-year option periods.

**Key Requirements:**

* Language: English
* Security Level: Secret
* Work Location: Virtual and in-person in the NRC

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Tender Submission

* Proposals must be submitted by email.
* Submission deadline: July 11, 2024, at 15:00 EST.

### Inquiries

* Inquiries regarding this tender must be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Julie Dessureault, at Julie.Dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca.

### Additional Information

* Documents may be submitted in either official language.
* SSC retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

### Contact Information

* Julie Dessureault
* Contact Email: Julie.Dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: 613-608-3114

### Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired

Note that I have reformatted the text to meet the 400-word limit, and removed some of the redundant information to make the text more concise. I have also corrected the format and grammar errors to make the text more professional. I have kept the most important information that highlights the key requirements, deadlines, and contact information. Let me know if you would like me to make any further changes. I have also reformatted the output into markdown format, which is cleaner and easier to read.
